COMPACT DESIGN: The Ava occupies a small footprint, making it ideal for compact spaces/when you are co-sharing Its lean design featuring a solid headboard with vertical routing lines and a modern frame give it a chic spin Available in 5 bold finishes

MATTRESS MATTERS: The Ava has a 3-position adjustable mattress height setting- adjust it as your child grows It comes with the regulatory 1” mattress pad Choose a DOM non-toxic, Greenguard Gold certified mini or portable crib mattress for a perfect fit
PRIORITIZING SAFETY: All our cribs tested for lead and other toxic elements to meet or exceed applicable ASTM and CCCR safety standards Use a damp cloth to wipe clean when it gets dirty
PRODUCT SPECS: Product dimensions are 44Lx29Wx40H inches The maximum weight limit is 40 lbs All tools/assembly instructions included
body.description: Looking for a crib that is small but packs a punch? Look no further than the Ava 4-in-1 Convertible Mini Crib. Minimalist with a small footprint, it’s ideal to make the most of small spaces or when you’re co-sharing your room with baby. Starting as a mini crib, you can convert it into a mini daybed and twin-size bed (bed rails sold separately). Built of solid pinewood, the Ava features a modern design - a solid headboard with vertical routing lines and a modern frame give it a chic spin. Choose from five bold finishes that work well with a nursery or a young child’s room! The Ava has a 3-position adjustable mattress height setting that you can adjust as your child grows. It comes with the regulatory 1” mattress pad. Choose a Dream On Me non-toxic, Greenguard Gold certified mini or portable crib mattress for a perfect fit. At Dream On Me we prioritize safety. All our cribs tested for lead and other toxic elements to meet or exceed applicable ASTM and CCCR safety standards. Use a damp cloth to wipe clean when it gets dirty. Product dimensions are 44Lx29Wx40H inches. Maximum weight limit is 40 lbs. All tools/assembly instructions included.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute crib for small spaces
reviews.reviewText: This crib is everything that we expected and the customer service was fantastic. Unfortunately, it took us a few weeks to be able to put it together in order to use it because we had a damaged piece. We reached out to the customer service team at the company and they were quick to respond and resolve the issue in a timely manner. They got the replacement part out to us as quickly as possible and the representative who we dealt with was in constant contact with us about the status of the replacement part up through delivery. Once we received the part, the assembly process was pretty simple and the instructions were easy to follow. Putting this together took about 45 minutes to an hour and it took both my wife and I to put it together but 1 person could put it together, if needed. We love how this looks in our room and now are son has a nice sturdy bed to lay in. We would recommend buying a new mattress, that’s specifically for mini cribs, as the one that came with it was way too thin. If you’re looking for a crib to fit in small spaces and one that converts to grow with your child then this is the crib for you. Also, if you have any issues with missing parts or damaged pieces, reach out to the company as they will rectify the issue as fast as they can. The company seems to want to make sure that their customers are satisfied with their products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy but assembly was a mess.
reviews.reviewText: It looks great but assembly was a mess, the pieces have the same holes on different sides but aren't clearly marked which side goes inward or outward so we ended up taking it apart multiple times to make corrections. Also, the bed height is determined before completion so now that I know it needs to be lowered I will have to take it partially apart to adjust this. There was a piece of tape on 1 of the legs, when we removed it thinking it was from the packaging we realized it was actually painted over so the paint came off. Overall it's not bad once it's assembled but think about the design if you plan to add crib bumpers because there's no way to attach them to the back panel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Worst crib ever. Dont buy this.
reviews.reviewText: The instructions were not correct. The easy to assemble, turned into ww3. Impossible to assemble. Instructions were not correct. Pieces labeled inccorrect so A doesnt fit B eyc...stressful is putting it nicely. I advise all to NOT PURCHSSE THIS CHEAPLY made crib. Parts are unpainted, pre drilled holes didnt line up at all. For a aingle female i looked for easy to assemble, and this was a disaster. I threw it in the garbage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute but damaged
reviews.reviewText: This mini crib is cute and sturdy, but came with many scratches as other people said. I was hoping I would be lucky and that wouldn’t be the case with mine, but there are many bumps and scratches. I didn’t want to deal with returning it so I’ll just deal with it. It was cheap so I wasn’t too worried.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for small spaces
reviews.reviewText: I didn’t even know mini cribs where a thing but it’s exactly what I needed for my grand baby’s mini nursery at my home. The color is a deep green, it was easy to put together & very sturdy. I did buy a thicker mattress but it does come with a super thin one. Great affordable price too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Value for money, Easy Assemble and size for small rooms
reviews.reviewText: First I read the reviews & people were complaining about the scratches and broken pieces and I was hoping it won’t happen to mine & YES it came in PERFECT!! No scratches nothing!!! I love my crib so much because our room isn’t that big so with this crib it’s perfect! It didn’t take up a lot of space… I love my crib it’s perfect! No negative comments about this crib! I’m so happy and can’t wait for my baby girl to use it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Missing parts/ Scratches and Dings
reviews.reviewText: The crib is an effective space saver. It did arrive with scratches and dings in some areas. The most frustrating issue is that it did not come with enough of the long bolts needed for assembly. We were short four which kept us from assembling the front bar piece. We will have to purchase the screws via a hardware store.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy crib and somewhat easy assembly
reviews.reviewText: We needed a crib that could have its front removed so we could convert it into a sidecar cosleeper. We put the mattress at the highest setting and then ziptied the crib to our bed frame which has worked fantastically. I really appreciate how the back is solid so nothing slips down behind the crib and it will hopefully look less like a crib convert when installed as a headboard. The crib sides are a bit thick so we weren't able to install the mobile we have but it is very sturdy which is more important than mobile-friendliness.I had a few minutes of irritation when the box arrived since the label said "3-in-1" instead of the "4-in-1" we ordered and I was afraid that the mattress height wasn't adjustable like the 4-in-1. Everything was fine but some clarification in the description would be nice.This crib was much easier to assemble than a previous crib we put together from the same brand. The screws had fewer pieces (no washers needed) despite there being the same number of wooden pieces. Like other reviews have pointed out, some of the pieces were mislabeled and the instructions did not make things much clearer. For reference, we've put together a lot of IKEA furniture that does not come with worded directions and IKEA directions were easier to understand than this crib's directions. If this brand would put out a step by step video for assembly it would be great.Overall, the product is good and we got exactly what we needed. The company could take some steps to make clearer directions and packaging.
